p: In the littoral area of Versilia and Pisa (North-Tuscany-Italy-Latitude: 43.873651; Longitude: 10.328756), Versil Green Società Agricola s.s., a commercial farm, cultivates several species of Eucalyptus for the production of ornamental green fronds and essential oils. The cultivated species are: Eucalyptus parvula L.A.S. Johnson & K.D. Hill, Eucalyptus cinerea F. Muell, Eucalyptus pulverulenta Sims and Eucalyptus pulverulenta baby blue Sims ( Table 3). Figure 3a–d show a picture of each plant. All samples are grown by organic practices, accredited according to the UNI EN 45011 standard. During the production of ornamental fronds, leaves and little stems were separated from the young branches of healthy plants of two years and distilled as reported in Section 3.3.
